This document captures local setup and common workflows.

## Setup

Run these in the RStudio Console to set up the environment and docs:

```r
renv::restore(prompt = FALSE)
pak::pak()                 # optional speed-up
devtools::document()
devtools::test()
```

Render documentation locally (optional):

```bash
quarto render docs/
```

## Pipeline

```r
targets::tar_make()
targets::tar_visnetwork()
```

## Notes

- No `library()` calls; use `import::from()` or fully qualified calls.
- Deterministic runs via `tar_option_set(seed = 1L)`.
